result.eng: He surprised her! That was nasty of him.

result.eng: Clearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.

result.eng: The first that people though of was terrorism, until it transpired that the thing [the earthquake] has seismic causes.

result.eng: I'd like to be a priest when I grow up.

result.eng: You could have gotten rid of him a little more kindly than you did.

result.eng: It is only now that things started to be bad in earnest.

result.eng: It's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.

result.eng: Going to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.

result.eng: It was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.

result.eng: She listened. Nothing more could be heard.
